meanings.definition: Having a leaf shape in which the petiole is attached near the center of the lower surface.
meanings.sent1: The peltately leaf had its stem attached in the middle.
meanings.sent2: The plant had peltately leaves with stems in the center.
meanings.sent3: The peltately leaf looked like a tiny umbrella for insects.
meanings.sent4: The peltately shape of the leaf shielded the delicate flower below.
meanings.sent5: The peltately leaf was like a protective canopy for the plant.

meanings.definition: In the shape of a shield or umbrella.
meanings.sent1: The shield was peltately shaped, covering the knight's arm.
meanings.sent2: The umbrella had a peltately design, keeping the rain off.
meanings.sent3: The peltately shield made the knight look like a walking fortress.
meanings.sent4: Her hat was peltately wide, shading her face from the sun.
meanings.sent5: The peltately umbrella was large enough to shelter the whole family.
